mapper.select:
SELECT SEND_NO as sendNo, ADMINISTRATOR_NO as administratorNo, INTEGRATION_MESSAGE_NO as integrationMessageNo, ( SELECT TITLE FROM INTEGRATION_MESSAGE WHERE INTEGRATION_MESSAGE.INTEGRATION_MESSAGE_NO = SEND.INTEGRATION_MESSAGE_NO ) integrationMessageTitle, ( SELECT CONTENT FROM INTEGRATION_MESSAGE WHERE INTEGRATION_MESSAGE.INTEGRATION_MESSAGE_NO = SEND.INTEGRATION_MESSAGE_NO ) integrationMessageContent, STUDENT_NO as studentNo, ( SELECT STUDENT_NAME FROM STUDENT WHERE STUDENT.STUDENT_NO = SEND.STUDENT_NO )studentName, SEND_DATE as sendDate, SEND_STATUS as sendStatus FROM SEND
AND SEND_NO = #{sendNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEND_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SEND ( SEND_NO, ADMINISTRATOR_NO, INTEGRATION_MESSAGE_NO, STUDENT_NO, SEND_DATE, SEND_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEND_NO_SEQ.Nextval, #{administratorNo}, #{integrationMessageNo}, #{studentNo}, SYSDATE, #{sendStatus} )
mapper.update:

SEND_NO = #{sendNo},
ADMINISTRATOR_NO = #{administratorNo},
